Uses of Class
org.gradoop.storage.hbase.config.GradoopHBaseConfig

  • Packages that use GradoopHBaseConfig 
    Package Description
    org.gradoop.storage.hbase.config
    Contains Configuration classes for Gradoop.
    org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl
    Contains all classes for storing EPGs in HBase.
    org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.factory
    Contains factory classes for gradoop hbase

    • Uses of GradoopHBaseConfig in org.gradoop.storage.hbase.config

      Methods in org.gradoop.storage.hbase.config that return GradoopHBaseConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GradoopHBaseConfig GradoopHBaseConfig.createConfig(GradoopHBaseConfig gradoopConfig, String graphTableName, String vertexTableName, String edgeTableName)
      Creates a Gradoop HBase configuration based on the given arguments.
      GradoopHBaseConfig GradoopHBaseConfig.enablePreSplitRegions(int numberOfRegions)
      Enable/Disable the usage of pre-splitting regions at the moment of table creation.
      static GradoopHBaseConfig GradoopHBaseConfig.getDefaultConfig()
      Creates a default Configuration using POJO handlers for vertices, edges and graph heads and default table names.
      GradoopHBaseConfig GradoopHBaseConfig.useSpreadingByte(int bucketCount)
      Enable/Disable the usage of a spreading byte as prefix of each HBase row key.
